data.enText: a difficult time for the economy of a country, when there is less trade and industrial activity than usual and more people are unemployed

data.chText: 时下经济萎缩对制造业的影响
data.enText: the impact of the current recession on manufacturing

data.chText: 经济正处于严重的衰退之中。
data.enText: The economy is in deep recession .

data.chText: 引导国家走出经济萎缩的政策
data.enText: policies to pull the country out of recession
the movement backwards of sth from a previous position
the gradual recession of the floodwater

simple_means.memory_skill: recess 休息；暂停 + ion 表动作 → 走回去 → 撤退

tr: the act of becoming more distant
the withdrawal of the clergy and choir from the chancel to the vestry at the end of a church service
the state of the economy declines
a widespread decline in the GDP and employment and trade lasting from six months to a year

value.def: A recession is a period when the economy of a country is doing badly, for example because industry is producing less and more people are becoming unemployed.

example.ex: The recession caused sales to drop off...
example.tran: 经济不景气使销量下降。

example.ex: We should concentrate on sharply reducing interest rates to pull the economy out of recession...
example.tran: 我们应该着力大幅下调利率以使经济走出衰退。

example.ex: The oil price increases sent Europe into deep recession.
example.tran: 油价上涨使欧洲陷入严重的经济衰退。

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to go, to proceed 行走, 前进
rootsaffixes.title: ced, ceed, cess

partsOfSpeech.dec: ac 加强 + ced 行走，前进 + e → 一起走 → 同意
ac 加强 + cess 行走，前进 → 一再向前走 → 接近
an 加强 + cest〔= cess〕行走，前进 + or 表人 → 走了很久的人 → 祖先
ante 前面 + ced 行走，前进 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 → 先行的；以前的
ced 行走，前进 + e →〔使〕走开 → 割让
ex 出 + ceed 行走，前进 → 走出去 → 超越
inter 在…之间 + ced 行走，前进 + e → 在两者中间走 → 调停
pre 预先 + ced 行走，前进 + e → 在先，优于
pre 前；预先 + ced 行走，前进 + ent 表名词 → 在前面的东西 → 先例
pro 在前 + ced 行走，前进 + ure 表结果 → 前面经过的〔历程〕→ 程序
pro 向前 + ceed 行走，前进 → 继续进行，前进
pro 向前 + cess 行走，前进 → 向前走的〔历程〕→ 过程
process 过程；进行 + ion 表名词 → 向前走 → 队伍
re 向后 + ced 行走，前进 + e → 后退
re 回 + cess 行走，前进 → 走回去 → 休息
recess 休息；暂停 + ion 表动作 → 走回去 → 撤退
se 分开 + ced 行走，前进 + e → 分开走 → 脱离
suc 下 + ceed 行走，前进 → 从下面走到上面 → 成功
suc 下 + cess 行走，前进 → 成功，胜利
un 无 + precedent 前例 + ed 表形容词 → 史无前例的
